subject: Harness Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Doping (Sports)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: New York State accused Luis Pena, a prominent horse trainer, of illegally drugging horses in hundreds of harness races over a 28-month period in the state.
snippet: New York State accused Luis Pena, a prominent horse trainer, of illegally drugging horses in hundreds of harness races over a 28-month period in the state.
